text:
♪ HAVE YOU EVER LOST, LOST
THE LIGHT IN YOUR LIFE? ♪

♪ HAVE YOU EVER LEFT,
LEFT YOURSELF BEHIND? ♪

♪ HAVE YOU EVER LIED AND
JUST REPLIED I'M FINE? ♪

♪ 'CAUSE I CAN SEE YOU'VE LOST,
LOST THE LIGHT IN YOUR LIFE ♪
♪ WANNA RUN LIKE YOUR MASCARA ♪

♪ WINE-STAINED LIPS
TALKING TO THE MIRROR ♪

♪ IF THE SUN COMES UP
DON'T EVEN CARE AT ALL ♪

♪ JUST KEEP ON DANCING
WITH THOSE TEARY EYES ♪

♪ JUST KEEP ON DANCING
